p: Atomic force microscopy (AFM) investigations were done with a Solver-Pro-M type instrument (Solver Inc., Moscow, Russia) under ambient conditions, using standard tips of Si 3N 4 (10 nm curvature radius). The root mean square roughness was calculated from the total image sample after a second-order flatness treatment of the raw data. NT-MDT Nova v.1.26.0.1443 software (NT-MDT Spectrum Instruments, Moscow, Russia) was used for the acquisition and analysis of the images.
